body.name: Sundu Pro Steam Station with Ceramic Soleplate, 1800W Steam Station Iron for Clothes with 1.5L Removable Water Tank, Iron Lock for Easy Carry, Auto ShutOff, Self Cleaning, Clothing Steam Iron for Home

features: 1800-Watts Steam Station: Sundu powerful steam station can let you easily glide across various garments and smooth hard-to-reach areas and select the ideal steam output and heating temperature to iron a variety of materials such as wool, knit, silk, linen, polyester, nylon and cotton. The continuous powerful steam output tackles even the toughest clothing wrinkles.

Double-layer Ceramic Soleplate: With a premium double-layer ceramic soleplate, the steam station iron provides optimum heat distribution and maximum steam penetration for a smooth ironing experience. Super anti-scratch, more durable and safer, and easier to clean and glide.

Auto Shut-off & LED Display: This safety feature ensures the Pro steam station is turned off automatically after 10 minutes, avoiding accidents and burnt clothes. With the Led display you can clearly know the temperature level (ECO, Max) and water shortage protection. The self-cleaning feature can expel water scales and other debris. ANTI-CALC prevents mineral build-up.

1.5L/50.72oz Removable Water Tank: Large detachable large capacity water tank design allows for longer periods of ironing without refills and is suitable for large family populations, hotels, clothing stores, etc. Equipped with a measuring cup, it provides for easy refills and endless ironing sessions.

Easy to Carry and Storage: Easy and safe lock system makes it easy to move the iron from place to place. This feature locks the iron to its base, keeping you safe. What's more, the steam cord storage gives you maximum convenience.

NOT A USED ITEM: All Sudnu irons are tested with water after production, this is to ensure that you get your hands on the product can be used normally, there will be water residue in the water tank after the test, please rest assured that this is a normal phenomenon, not a used product.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Sundu 1800 Watts Pro Steam Station Iron with Dual-Ceramic Soleplate & 1.5L Detachable Water Tank Independent steam and temperature controls give you the ability to customize each setting separately for the best results across all fabric types. With the clear LED screen feature, you can easily select your fabric type and always iron with the right heat.

Unique LED Screen Unique digital display function, clear and concise display all functions: temperature level (ECO, Max), no operation automatic shut-off, water shortage protection, self-cleaning to expel water scale and other debris. Safety Lock for Easy Carry The Steam base is designed with a locking device that locks the iron to the base and allows you to lift the whole machine with one-hand, making it easy to move the product. Dry & Steam Steam Station Effortlessly remove the toughest wrinkles with evenly dispersed heat and high steam output. Safe for all fabrics and select dry ironing or steam ironing.

1.5L Removable Water Tank The iron’s large water tank holds up to 1.5L/50.72oz for ironing multiple pieces without needing to stop and refill. This clothes iron also includes an anti-CALC feature that eliminates calcium build-up to increase the lifetime of the iron. 10Min Safety Auto-Off Designed with safety shut-off, the iron shuts off when left unattended for 10 minutes on its side, soleplate and on the heel rest. Double-layer Ceramic Soleplate Ddopted ceramic soleplate is more durable than stainless steel, super scratch resistant, and much easier to clean. Perfect for ironing dainty fabrics and detailed areas such as creases, collars, sleeves, and pockets.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars SO FAR SO GOOD
reviews.reviewText: I've used many of irons while sewing and I will say that this particular one has been very useful and I love it so far. The steam put out is very even, it warms up pretty fast and the attached water tank makes it easier to reserve more space than my hanging boiler irons.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This iron boasts quality, featuring an LED screen that displays the temperature, ensuring you're always aware of the heat setting. Additionally, it includes a self-cleaning function for hassle-free maintenance. A standout feature is its automatic shut-off mechanism, enhancing safety and energy efficiency.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This was a great purchase. The iron heats up very quick and does a great job. Great value for money in my opinion.Highly recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I am pleased
reviews.reviewText: I really liked the iron, very easy to use. Feels light in the hand, quite comfortable. It irons well, with enough modes for any fabric. Handles steaming effortlessly and easy to clean. A good iron, highly recommend buying

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Clear led screen, comfortable to grasp and move
reviews.reviewText: This iron machine is light, and led digital screen is easy to read and very useful. I iron slowly, so it takes a long time for me when i do it, still I dont feel tired. It looks cool, like a futuristic product, too

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Powerful iron. It heats up quickly and able to burst a lot of steam. It is easy fill with water and it lasts long enough to iron couples of shirt with high steam mode. The iron also has a button for self cleaning function to clean the steel soleplate!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This is my first time purchase for the iron, this iron is eazy to use, now I can iron my shirts at home instead of go to the dry cleaning shop.It works very good～

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazing Led screen iron
reviews.reviewText: Always looking for light weight iron ,,this iron is amazing with LED screen, working great ,,my husband iron clothes twice a day ,,he was amazed with iron steam and water last for couple of days,,love love love it
